headline: Is It Too Late To Reassess Citizens Financial Group (CFG) After Its Strong Multi‑Year Run?
summary: If you are wondering whether Citizens Financial Group is still good value after its recent run, this article will walk through what the current price could mean for long term investors. The stock closed at US$63.49, with a 1.2% decline over the last week, a 7.7% gain over 30 days, a 6.9% gain year to date, and longer term returns of 36.3% over 1 year, 62.3% over 3 years and 94.7% over 5 years. Recent attention on U.S. regional banks, changes in interest rate expectations and ongoing...
